name: @mendix/ar-widgets-native
description: The container used to start an AR experience
copyright: Â© Mendix Technology BV 2023. All rights reserved.
author: Mendix

scripts.buildAllNative: npm run --prefix "./Native/3DObject" build && npm run --prefix "./Native/Cube" build && npm run --prefix "./Native/ImageTracker" build && npm run --prefix "./Native/Node" build && npm run --prefix "./Native/Sphere" build && npm run --prefix "./Native/Square" build && npm run --prefix "./Native/Container" build && npm run --prefix "./Native/ImageTracker" build
scripts.buildReleaseNative: npm run --prefix "./Native/Cube" releaseWithPrettier && npm run --prefix "./Native/Sphere" releaseWithPrettier && npm run --prefix "./Native/Square" releaseWithPrettier && npm run --prefix "./Native/Node" releaseWithPrettier && npm run --prefix "./Native/Container" releaseWithPrettier && npm run --prefix "./Native/3DObject" releaseWithPrettier && npm run --prefix "./Native/ImageTracker" releaseWithPrettier
scripts.moveReleasesNative: mkdir Native/Release && npm run --prefix "./Native/Cube" moveRelease && npm run --prefix "./Native/Sphere" moveRelease && npm run --prefix "./Native/Square" moveRelease && npm run --prefix "./Native/Node" moveRelease && npm run --prefix "./Native/Container" moveRelease && npm run --prefix "./Native/3DObject" moveRelease && npm run --prefix "./Native/ImageTracker" moveRelease
scripts.buildAllWeb: npm run --prefix "./Web/Cube" build && npm run --prefix "./Web/Sphere" build && npm run --prefix "./Web/Square" build && npm run --prefix "./Web/Node" build && npm run --prefix "./Web/Container" build && npm run --prefix "./Web/3DObject" build
scripts.buildReleaseWeb: npm run --prefix "./Web/Cube" releaseWithPrettier && npm run --prefix "./Web/Sphere" releaseWithPrettier && npm run --prefix "./Web/Square" releaseWithPrettier && npm run --prefix "./Web/Node" releaseWithPrettier && npm run --prefix "./Web/Container" releaseWithPrettier && npm run --prefix "./Web/3DObject" releaseWithPrettier
scripts.moveReleasesWeb: mkdir Web/Release && npm run --prefix "./Web/Cube" moveRelease && npm run --prefix "./Web/Sphere" moveRelease && npm run --prefix "./Web/Square" moveRelease && npm run --prefix "./Web/Node" moveRelease && npm run --prefix "./Web/Container" moveRelease && npm run --prefix "./Web/3DObject" moveRelease
